title: gendyn~
description: The `gendyn~` object generates audio using Dynamic Stochastic Synthesis, based on Xenakis' 'GenDyn' algorithm. It creates a waveform whose points undergo a random walk in both amplitude and frequency, allowing control over the number of points, frequency range, amplitude/frequency step percentages, and interpolation type. Users can also specify different probability distributions for the random steps and seed the random number generator for reproducible results.
